website_summaries.verdict: Delivers unsurpassed flavor thanks to its shower-head water distribution and variable strength settings. Attractive design that fits underneath most cabinets.
pros: Brews using loose-leaf tea or tea bags
Three-position lid lets you pour as much or as little ice as you want
cons: Jug is made from thin glass, and customers report it breaks relatively easily

customer_reviews.title: It makes great tasting ice tea
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this pitcher about a month. It makes great tasting ice tea. I fortunately noticed a couple of days ago a sharp edge where the handle is connected to pitcher at the top. I realized that one more time of picking up the pitcher would have been a disaster because it was almost off. The pitcher would have been in the floor in a thousand pieces & tea everywhere. This is a very poor quality pitcher. I would suggest not buying it. It will be at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C

customer_reviews.title: FRAGILE pitcher, no replacement
customer_reviews.text: I used this machine daily & it makes great tea. The pitcher is so fragile that I am afraid to even fill the pitcher with ice directly from my ice maker. When rising it out, I treat it like fine china. And I would never put it in the dishwasher. Today, I was putting the plastic cap on and the pitcher broke in to 3 pieces. If I could replace the pitcher, then it would be no big deal. Without the option to replace the pitcher, I DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: James Short

customer_reviews.title: Buy this tea maker!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I've been using "the other brand" tea maker for over 20 years. The one I had keep leaking water all over the counter. So I purchased the Nostalgia tea maker. Love it! I made my sweet tea the way I've always made it. It tasted better than ever! Love love love. The tea had flavor. Lots of flavor. It is easy to use. And it looks modern and stylish on the counter instead of cheap and childish. Love. Would buy again and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great tea...terrible pitcher.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the tea it makes..no problem there. But one star is being deducted because the glass pitcher didn't last more than a few weeks before cracking...not well made at all. Second star off because replacement pitchers are not available. If we didn't have a plastic pitcher that fit under the unit it would have been a pricey door stop. Too bad the pitcher wasn't stronger...would have been a 5 star for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: This tea maker is great. Easy to use and keep clean
customer_reviews.text: March 5, 2019. Love this tea maker. I make about 5 pitchers per week and it’s going great. 👍👍👍👍👍 This tea maker is great. Easy to use and keep clean. I’ve had mine since early January 2018. Somehow the glass pitcher got a crack in the bottom. I don’t know if I was stirring to hard with my wood spoon or what. BUT, I contacted costumer service sent a copy of my receipt and they are sending me a replacement pitcher. I didn’t register my purchase as I should have for warranty reasons. Thus they requested a copy of my receipt. I ordered via Amazon model C13BK.👍👍
customer_reviews.author: brenda weber

customer_reviews.title: Poor Choice of Pitcher Material
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I've only used this item once. I went to pour the tea into my glass and I heard a crack. THE HANDLE IS CRACKED!! Definitely not what you'd expect from something that cost almost $40 and is BRAND NEW!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome iced tea maker
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is the lack of instructions. After some trial and error, here's my recipe for perfect iced tea with this machine: One luzianne tea bag Two bags Irish breakfast Pour 1/2 cup sugar and 1/2 teaspoon baking soda on top of ice in carafe I like my tea dark & strong, so I keep it dialed to 8. I make a pitcher every other day for a thirsty family of 4.
customer_reviews.author: A. Klos

customer_reviews.title: Very thin glass
customer_reviews.text: The iced tea maker itself works fine. It's nothing special. Easy to use. The pitcher however is awful. It is paper thin glass, you have to handle it very gently. Ours broke after less than 2 months and when I tried to get a replacement, I found that you cannot buy the pitcher separately. Luckily Mr Coffee pitcher fits perfectly and is made of thicker glass. I would definitely not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Himmelberger

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product. Almost caught fire during FIRST use.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this brand new, hadn't even got a chance to actually use it before it broke. Pulled it out of the box and everything was just fine. Plugged it in and let it sit so the water could warm up. After about 15, 20 minutes we smelled this horrible plastic/electrical smell and I immediately knew it was coffee/tea maker. We ran to the kitchen and could see that the maker had just started to smoke and it was burning to the touch. Thankfully we didn't turn it on and leave the house. We could have lost everything. Like I said in the title, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this tea maker. We’ve had it for a few months and I make tea almost once a day. The dial for tea strength is great so you can have your tea strong or light. It also looks great on the counter and isn’t an eye sore.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Glass Pitcher way too thin!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of the tea maker and it didn't take up a lot of cabinet space. Easy to operate. However, the glass pitcher is so thin that it only lasted a couple of uses before cracking. It may be the thinnest glass pitcher I have ever seen. There is quite a difference in the price versus the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: SheilaY

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t add ice
customer_reviews.text: I use this coffee maker every other day to make a pitcher of ice tea and it’s delicious!! I’ve read a lot of reviews about the pitcher breaking but if your careful with it and don’t add ice it’s fine..I fill it up all the way with water instead and when it’s done brewing I let it cool then put in another container in the refrigerator. You won’t be sorry you bought it so much better than the plastic pitcher ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Coffee too!
customer_reviews.text: I discover after I purchased the unit that my 8 cup Chemex coffee pot fits it perfectly. So not only do I make ice tea but now I make fresh hot coffee and what I love is that there is no hot plate on the bottom to burn the brew. So after the coffee is brewed it goes right into my thermos. Now some may not think the water is hot enough to brew fresh ground coffee but I found the temp for the water when it hits the coffee is about 180 Fahrenheit and the coffee comes out fine.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.B

customer_reviews.title: Looks classy on counter!
customer_reviews.text: So it’s is more expensive than the colorful plastic jobs, but I think it’s worth it. It looks like an appliance on the counter. Fits in nicely with a vita mix soda stream and opel ice maker. Works great. I really like the ability to use loose or bagged tea. Also being able to adjust the tea strength is a nice feature. The carafe is glass which sort of scares me so I’m careful. Just an aside. I make my tea on the strongest setting without any ice and then fill with water to the ice line. Then I ice my glass. It works great and I only use the ice when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Y

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a very very picky coffee drinker. I literally will only drink Starbucks or Dunkin every single day. I have every coffee maker known and I can never make coffee taste right. It is like I have a mental block. LOL. My family thinks it is a joke. I only like it and drink it a certain way. So my husband bought this for me. So thankful he did. I bought Dunkin whole beans put them in my grinder then put them in this lovely coffee maker. You will not regret this purchase. I put about 8 scoops of coffee and set it on 5.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Carver

customer_reviews.title: Even after treating it as very fragile, the pitcher still broke
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 8 months, and today the pitcher broke. I was pulling a full pitcher out of the machine and as I set it down on the counter about a 2 square inches of the bottom broke out, dumping the tea all over the place. The only consolation is that it didn't shatter into a million pieces, but still it's ridiculous that the glass is so thin that it cannot stand up to gentle use. Buy it if you like, enjoy it while you can, but one day you're going to be wearing a pitcher full of iced tea.
customer_reviews.author: Charles McGuinness

customer_reviews.title: I should have listened.
customer_reviews.text: This product breaks way too easily. While placing the pitcher on the base, the lip touched the top. A large curved area cracked off and dropped into the pitcher. I should have listened to the other reviews about it being too thin. The literature that comes with the pitcher stresses that placing ice into it should be done like moving newborn kittens. They know this thing is more fragile than any tea cup, yet they don't give it a better pitcher. Spend a little more if you have to, hard pass on this tea maker.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki

customer_reviews.title: Iced tea brewer
customer_reviews.text: It started smoking (from where the electric plug came from out of the back of the unit) the as soon as I turned it on.
customer_reviews.author: The Jeep Diva

customer_reviews.title: Love this iced tea maker
customer_reviews.text: edited to adjust rating: I really do love this iced tea maker but the carafe is entirely too fragile. I had to purchase a whole new machine to replace the last 2 broken carafes. Skip over this one :( I’ve had several iced tea makers and they’ve been so so. Since I don’t like plain water most of my fluid intake is unsweetened tea. This maker is a game changer. Brews exceptional iced tea.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this iced tea maker! Easy to use and brews quickly. You can adjust the strength too, or use it to make iced coffee. The pitcher isn’t thick glass, but it’s not going to crack unless you hit it on something so just be gentle with it. This is one of my best Amazon purchases :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for Christmas. It made good tea. But here we are on March 29 and it has died. I didn't know I only had till Jan 31 to return it. What a ripoff. This will teach me to buy local!!!
customer_reviews.author: pk

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Tea maker but Fragile glass container
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this tea maker. Its very easy to use however, the glass container is so fragile that it broke very soon after using. I was extremely careful using it but even with being extra careful it broke. I think the combo of HOT tea and COLD ice going into the container, its more temperamental. I went on their website several times but the glass container is always out of stock. I am using a hard plastic pitcher now and it works much better. Other than the problematic glass container, its a nice machine.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but VERY THIN GLASS PITCHER!
customer_reviews.text: This is a much more stylish, almost retro, kitchen appliance than the plain tea makers you buy at big box stores. I like that it's simple to use. Pros: Stylish lightweight plastic design Spacesaver The tea tastes great Cons: This does indeed come with a glass pitcher but the glass is nearly paper-thin. DO NOT USE HOT WATER to clean and make sure you have ice or water in the pitcher as the tea is brewing or it will likely shatter. The lid for the pitcher is loose-fitting so be super careful Overall, if you are needing this for occasional use and do not have little ones at home that may accidentally knock over the pitcher, it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking!
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice on my countertop. My caregiver makes me a pot every couple of days. It doesn't always make as strong a pot as I like, but I just add a little instant coffee. But, it is nice to be able to make it from home instead of buying a carton or two. I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Gail Harder

customer_reviews.title: Quality investment. Strength adjusts spout widening angles.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't give it up. But for future reference, please increase the strength of the plastic if you have manufacturers access. Otherwise, with the 1 to 8 settings on strength of brew, however convenient and tasteful, the water pressurizer flows faster than the strength taper on spout. As much as I enjoy longer brews in the bean grounds chamber, I'm getting grounds overflow past the filter basket and into the carafe while I prefer brews at 6 and 7. I'm sure the more expensive models provide adjustable pressurizers. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rei Wu

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: I thought the quality/durability of every part was questionable. The package even has a piece of paper in it that warns you about dropping ice into pitcher (don't drop ice into it because it will break the glass). You have to gently place each ice cube into the pitcher, apparently. I just couldn't seen this thing lasting very long so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Glass is very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: After 3 uses I was taking the lid off to clean before making more tea. The glass shattered. I would say users fault. But I had it on counter, and just tried to remove lid. No force at all. So I'm going to find a plastic pitcher that fits. The maker itself is cute and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Foreverunited

customer_reviews.title: This unit makes great Ice Tea
customer_reviews.text: I use this tea maker every day. You have to wash out the pitcher occasionally so tea residue does not flake off. Te residue will plug the drip hole above the pitcher. These screens are easy to remove and wash. This is a small issue compared to the great tea. I mostly make green tea in bags.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Friis

customer_reviews.title: Owned for short time and glass pitcher broke while putting ...
customer_reviews.text: Owned for short time and glass pitcher broke while putting ice in it....when it arrived I was concerned that the pitcher glass was so thin and my concern was proven correct very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Nice system, carafe needs some work.
customer_reviews.text: Carafe broke with the week, after taking the precautions identified in the manual. Still use with a plastic vessel.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting tea ever!
customer_reviews.text: No more water on the counter! Very easy to use. Tea tastes much better. I love that I can adjust the strength! The pitcher does seem fragile, but so far so good. I use it about 5 times a week. I do not serve from the pitcher. Once brewed I transfer to a heavy duty pitcher that can take rougher handling with kids in the house. I would definitely buy again. If the pitcher does break, I have my machine marked for fill line and I'm sure i can find an alternative pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: sltg

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Maker Ever
customer_reviews.text: We went through 2 tea makers before purchasing this unit. It makes a good amount of tea, but does require a lot of ice. Since my wife and I brew two pitchers of tea to last us all day, we had to purchase additional bags of ice because our fridge ice maker couldn't keep up with the demand. Easy to use. Remember to use the pitcher for water first and ice second. Sometimes I forget. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hieu Truong

customer_reviews.title: Non-Tempered Glass Carafe
customer_reviews.text: Makes great ice tea. Very surprised the Consumer Product Safety Commission hasn't ordered a recall or replacement of the carafe. It's extremely dangerous considering it's purpose. I would have gladly paid a higher price to have a quality tempered glass carafe.
customer_reviews.author: American

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This product started out great. Until this week. A small tap on the counter and the whole carafe shattered. We did wonder since the carafe seemed light but it made it two months with us making 2 to 6 carafes per day.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great Iced tea...fragile pitcher
customer_reviews.text: This machine works great! It's easy to make tea or coffee and easy to clean (the machine anyway). The only thing that detracts from the overall rating is the SUPER thin glass the pitcher is made of. It hasn't broken yet, but I fear it's only a matter of time before it's bumped against the side of the sink while washing and shatters. Fortunately I have our old tea makers plastic pitcher and use that.
customer_reviews.author: Sangediver

customer_reviews.title: Was a great product. The unit light doesn't come on and it doesn't heat up.
customer_reviews.text: This is an update from my last comment. The tea maker was great until the unit stopped working. The light does not come on when plugged into wall outlet. Since the light doesn't come on, the water doesn't heat up. And the pitcher is made of thin glass, but mine didn't break as long as you take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the NOSTALGIA ice coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: We tried 3 times to make a pot of ice coffee. However we put in the 9 tablespoons first try and turned to knob to strong. Well we had coffee grinds every where. We tossed first pot out tried again using 7 tablespoons again coffee all over and in the glass pot as well. So again we tossed batch number 2. Then we tried a third time using 7 tablespoons and turning knob down from strong to 1/2 and finally we had no coffee grinds all over but it was all watered down and just not strong like ice coffee should be. I am so disappointed and I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: This makes better tea than our Mr Coffee tea maker ever did
customer_reviews.text: This makes better tea than our Mr Coffee tea maker ever did. The pitcher is extremely light and probably won't stand up to any abuse, but it is glass so it won't be absorbing any odors and will be easy to clean if you forget it has tea and it happens to mold.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and FAST tea maker
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It's fast and delicious! The vase that holds the tea is fairly thin and fragile, but I just transfer the tea after its made to a more durable container. Just be sure to read the instructions prior to use and all will be well!
customer_reviews.author: DondaB

customer_reviews.title: We loved our ice tea coffee machine!
customer_reviews.text: It’s was a Christmas gift for my husband but we are so excited for test it and we opened before Christmas. Hehehe and it exceeded expectations of my husband. He simply loved it, so easy to do and to clean. He loved the jar come with it and until now we dont had problems about broken it by put hot or cold water although it is very thin, what i was worried about. I just think the machine is exaggerated biggest than I imagined but it fine, he loves to do a lot the ice tea, so for him it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jéssica Dionizio

customer_reviews.title: I love the look, but...
customer_reviews.text: The nostalgia look is great. The carafe is paper thin and feels like one little bump in the sink, it's going to shatter. The plastic is flimsy. It has a strength dial (which is useless) and an "on" only button. You have to unplug it if you need to stop it. I paid too much at $29.99... $12 would be about right. it's more novelty than a long lasting functional kitchen appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Joleen

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: The tea maker is fine overall. I like it, it's attractive, generally happy with it. However, today I noticed that the mesh in the strainer basket has come loose on one corner. I didn't see a way to just contact the seller and it seems that this should be able to be resolved without returning the entire tea maker. Is there a way to just get a new basket? Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia Iced Tea Brewing System....Lid Needs be Deep Sixed !
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this system EXCEPT the lid is too small for the pitcher. If falls out when I pour unless I hold it in. It spins around so the holes don't match unless I hold it still. I will use this one until it breaks but won't by another one. Which is really too bad because I love the tea it brews and the size of the pitcher. Update 3/28/20. I have used this for 6 months now. Still don't like the lid that's too small but I really love the machine. It makes the best tea and ice cold as soon as it's brewed. I will buy another if this one breaks. I use it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Burnett

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: This makes great sweet tea, I haven't used it for iced coffee. It comes with a basket to brew loose tea, and I have found using loose leaf black tea this really improves the quality of my iced tea. The pitcher glass is VERY THIN, so I am very gentle with it. When hand washing it I'm always afraid the handle will break off or I will inadvertently bump the pitcher on the side of the sink and it will crack...so far, it hasn't happened, but it is very, very fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Darabaris

customer_reviews.title: Nice but warped
customer_reviews.text: Really like it but there is one thing wrong with it.It will not close right after the first use.the picture kinda explain it all.so now I have a decent looking tea maker on my counter with a warped lid so I got mixed feelings about it the question is does that happen to all of them or did I get a lemon.i bought it new not used so I'm just wondering if this is what I'm to live with or do I get a replacement or what.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a birthday gift, and my brother n law loves it
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlind kirbach

customer_reviews.title: Good looks, cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product! All of the materials are thin and cheap. The glass on the pitcher is so thin that if you tap it the wrong way it seems like it would shatter. So careful handling when cleaning! The plastic is so thin that when the hot water pumps thru to make the tea, the lid warps until it cools down. Looks nice, Cheaply made product!
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: Glass Carafe Broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tea maker in 2019, it worked fine until today...the glass carafe cracked & shattered all over the countertop. What a HUGE mess with broken glass everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff HathawayTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Tea Time
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Used to make my tea on the stove then dump over ice and stir and all that. Now, I throw everything in the machine and in 15 minutes, tea time.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Burton

customer_reviews.title: Tea for to
customer_reviews.text: It makes great ice tea. Can use any type of tea. In a few minutes you have tea. The only thing is that the cover warp and does close right and they dont make it anymore
customer_reviews.author: Howard S

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok coffee maker, I just don't like how thin the glass pitcher is. You have to be very careful with it
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, makes delicious tea
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the hunt for an excellent ice tea maker for a while. I did a lot of research, and I have tried various methods. This ice tea maker, it makes an excellent quality, is user-friendly, and has an easy cleanup. The glass picture, it was ideal for me, because I feel like glass doesn’t retain stain and smells. While the glass does feel a little thin, as of now it’s held up well. I’m just very cautious when handwashing it
customer_reviews.author: Erin Roe

customer_reviews.title: Finally...
customer_reviews.text: First one got lost in the mail I'm assuming ,this is the 2nd that was sent out. Couldn't be more pleased with ease of use and to clean and quality of finished product. Worth the coin if you want a cool retro maker.
customer_reviews.author: Joeallev972

customer_reviews.title: A great tea brewer overall
customer_reviews.text: Love this device, especially the look. It’s not like most ugly small appliances. The flavor of its brews, even on the “strong” setting, is weak to me, but okay if you increase the amount of tea from their recommended amounts. The glass pitcher broke within weeks, but it still works with another pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: Lane R.

customer_reviews.title: Fragile pitcher
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews for this product before I decided to try it. My biggest concern was the glass fragility noted by others. I handled the pitcher properly, including the manufacturers instructions to load ice into the pitcher tilted sideways as to avoid the corner of an ice cube cracking the glass. On the third use, the hot tea quickly melted through the ice, hit the bottom of the pitcher and cracked it. Based on this, it appears as though the glass pitcher is not only thin as suggested by other reviews, but it also is not made of tempered glass which increases the likelihood of breakage.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Shedlock

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really optimistic about this product, especially given that I waited a really long time to receive it after multiple delays but found it to be of cheaper quality than expected. The lid on the water well doesn’t close completely and the lid for the pot doesn’t fit well and comes off when pouring. With less than a month of use at once a week or less, the pot has already cracked on the bottom and leaks, so we will be recycling this after using less than four times.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: better with glass
customer_reviews.text: The first one was broke but a replacement was sent right away. I am a tea drinker and my tea taste much better made in glass "pot", which is easy to clean so fresh tea every time. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M. King

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ice tea maker, easy to use and you can adjust the flavor intensity. I was disappointed when the pitcher broke while cleaning it. It is made of glass so it is fragile. That said, I called the customer service line and they ordered me up a replacement no charge and the representative was very curteous. I would suggest purchasing this item, just be careful with the pitcher!
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Pitcher is direct replacement for me coffee
customer_reviews.text: If you broke your mr coffee pitcher and you are looking at new units..this pitcher is exact replacement. This unit is fairly tall. Makes fine tea.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Be nice if it didn't drip all over
customer_reviews.text: A little bit messy because it drips water out the hole when you take the pitcher out of place to pour a glass, but it makes tea nicely and it looks nice. The pitcher is attractive and easy to clean. You'll need a kitchen towel to wipe the spilt water off the countertops but at least you'll have a nice fresh glass of tea while you do it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Holifield

customer_reviews.title: Beware junk!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 0 stars if I could. Pitcher came broken. I read the reviews but thought I would give it a try. Big mistake! Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Gina, Florida

customer_reviews.title: Love this iced tea maker!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this iced tea maker! It’s not only so cool as a design but it makes awesome iced tea. The pitcher is thin and a bit fragile but if you are careful you should be fine. We use an acrylic pitcher to serve the iced tea with ice after it is brewed and that system is working fine!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie F. Dicola

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Love home brewed iced tea Just wish could brew darker Moving slider for that doesnt make a difference
customer_reviews.author: pedsnpvet

customer_reviews.title: great pot
customer_reviews.text: I love the retro look of this iced tea maker. I like the glass carafe rather than plastic. A really nice pot. Oh yes, it is black. I have had many tea makers and were always white. This one is shiny black and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price, cheap materials...
customer_reviews.text: It works but it is clear that it was made cheaply. The lip won’t stay fully closed due to flimsy plastic material. LED indicator is recessed down in the bottom on maker rather than mounded in the hole meant for it. Overall I suppose I got what I paid for... it was cheap and made of cheap materials.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Fore hazard
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even get to use it. I plugged it in and it began smoking from the back if the unit where the power cord plugs in and it smelled like hot plastic. I promptly unplugged it and contacted technical support. I was quickly shipped a replacement of the same item. We recieved it within 2 days and the same thing happened! I would not recommend this product to anyone considering it is a huge safety hazard. I can see an electrical issue with one, but 2 in a row? Amazon should stop selling this item until the company investigates this issue and corrects it.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Atkins

customer_reviews.title: PITCHER IS TOO THIN
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS UNLESS YOU HAVE A LOT OF EXTRA PITCHERS TO USE AS REPLACEMENTS. Believe all the reviews when they say the glass pitcher IS THIN. I made 1 pot of tea yesterday. I was happy with flavor and ease of use. I rinsed the pot and started to make a new batch of tea but noticed a hair line crack at the spout. REALLY .... not even 24 hours. I have always had glass pitchers, we are not rough with them !! They should immediately stop making this pitcher and find a sturdy replacement. Thank goodness I have something that fits.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Jakoby

customer_reviews.title: Makes great tasting tea
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this for about two weeks now but I really like it. I like that the little tea bin is bigger than the others you can buy so it allows me to put more tea bags in if I want which is great. It taste very good. The only thing I think kinda sucks is that it takes longer to brew than what I’m used to.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with this product. First the pitcher broke on the 2nd day. I continued to use it with a plastic pitcher I already had. And then today the unit won't even work. I tried to ask for a replacement but was told I am 4 days past the return date and I have to contact the manufacturer! I would not buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good product if you follow instructions and take care of your product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for Christmas, he’s an avid tea drinker and doesn’t particularly likes the iced watered down taste of the cubes, so no worries about breaking the pitcher. Good quality and shows well on the countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Metzler

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product!! Very easy to use , clean, makes excellent tea quickly. I am so happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Triciahsmom816

customer_reviews.title: Cheap glass carafe
customer_reviews.text: The carafe is extremely thin glass and it doesn't make three quarts unless you add ice to the carafe i guess. I had a Mr. Coffee ice tea maker with the plastic carafe for half the price. It makes more ice tea per brew and you don't risk a broken carafe. This is a cheap piece of garbage. I would not recommend this product over the mr coffee. The only saving grace is the loose tea option because of the mesh basket. I had to buy coffee filters for loose tea with the mr. Coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good for two weeks
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I guess I don't learn. The first one worked fine for two weeks. Then it wouldn't turn on. I'm two weeks in with the second one, and I notice a hairline crack in the plastic face that water leaks out of. I got a warranty this time. Let's see how that works. You may not want to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: jasbrosauce

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough for the South!
customer_reviews.text: Tough to please southern tea drinkers but this one is spot on! We eliminate the ice and fill with water. Sugar disolves better in the warm tea. Stir in the sugar after brewing. We pour it on ice. My only negative is that the glass on the pitcher is too thin. We have broken three of them! Makes me want to try to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Janet D.

customer_reviews.title: poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this certain product because it looked like a very good made product and its not. I also ordered it because it has a glass pitcher. But taking it out I was Disappointed. Its very flimsy plastic. The pitcher does not seem to be glass to me, more like plastic. If it is glass its cheap cheap cheap. When I first plugged it in it started smoking but stopped. It worked great but not impressed with what it was made with.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother! Mine last 2 months and maybe a dozen brews before dying on me!
customer_reviews.text: This was really nice when I opened it. It worked well for about 10-12 brews and then today I went to make a new pitcher and the entire unit had just completely died. I would have expected a little bit better craftsmanship from a small appliance. Next time I won't bother with Nostalgia!
customer_reviews.author: GypsyCowgirl

customer_reviews.title: No pitcher replacement available anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: The flimsy glass pitcher broke and they have no replacements anywhere. Do not get one. It worked fine until the pitcher broke. It was not 3 quarts it is only 2. Can't use it with a different pitcher. Not happy with this purchase at all!
customer_reviews.author: C. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Using 2 family size tea bags makes a great flavor of tea.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ease of this ice tea maker. It takes seconds to set it up and just a few minutes to have a full pitcher. I’ve had other tea makers for years but I really like the sleek look of this Nostalgia tea maker. The glass pitcher looks nice on the table as well. I liked it so much that turned right around and bought one for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Wozniak

customer_reviews.title: GOOD TEA!
customer_reviews.text: The Tea maker is very easy to use. I also like the glass pitcher. The plastics ones stain easily. I love the flavor of the tea....
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT...HAD TO HAVE IT REPLACED BECAUSE AMAZON DELIVERY LOVES TO THROW PACKAGES ON PORCHES...REPLACEMENT WAS GENTLY PLACED AND WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.author: Michael Walters

customer_reviews.title: Good iced tea.
customer_reviews.text: The tea maker is excellent and the pitcher for the tea is very pretty. However, it is made of glass and seems entirely to thin to be very sturdy. I would much have preferred a nice plastic feature. Hence the reason for four stars instead of five.
customer_reviews.author: Martha J. Stefas

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The glass is very cheap and the plastic is even cheaper, but I pour my tea into a plastic container so it’s works fine. I wouldn’t use the glass to carry the tea around and serve it, or store it, but for the price, it’s good......
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Very good Tea Maker
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, quick to make tea and easy to clean-up after making tea.
customer_reviews.author: charles lawhon

customer_reviews.title: Great Tea Maker, Worthless Pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: This tea maker works very well but it would be nice if it made a full gallon at a time. It is very easy to use and the tea tastes great. The pitcher that comes with the tea maker is worthless. It broke into pieces the first time I washed it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C.

customer_reviews.title: Great look, but has flaws
customer_reviews.text: Great look and size. I wanted a tea brewer and this fits the bill. However, the glass is very fragile. Mine is cracking all over after having it for only a few months and I have been unsuccessful in finding a replacement piece. My tea brewer before this was smaller and didn't make as much tea at a time, but it lasted me years and was cheaper. Looks like I'm in the market for a new iced tea maker and I'm going to find a different make and model. One that lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this unless you have something ready to soak up a mess
customer_reviews.text: So, a few months after I got it, I'm stirring some tea.... and the bottom shatters. This thing somehow got stupidly brittle, and broke when a wooden spoon merely tapped the inside. in short... don't buy it. Get something else. If I could get my money back, I would.
customer_reviews.author: James News

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product for Iced Coffee drinkers. Gave as a gift, said a week later doesn't know how she lived without it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: Unit started generating smoke when plugged in for first time.
customer_reviews.text: A word of caution. Received the unit and it looked like the packaging had already been opened before so it might have been a possible return sent to me. Upon plugging in the unit it immediately started to generate some smoke/fumes and burning plastic smell. I immediately unplugged it. Please be careful when initially plugging this unit in the first time and do not leave unattended for the first few cycles. I may have just received a bad one but I am not going to chance another one and will look for alternatives. Stay safe.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Pitcher lasted 5 brews... the pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: If you want an ice tea maker that’ll last a while but the pitcher can’t handle an ice cube being dispensed from the fridge, then look no further! This is the product for you
customer_reviews.author: Derek Schuyler

customer_reviews.title: Product broke twice, not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Beautiful color but extremely flimsy. Ive broken 2 of these within a month by simply setting the pitcher down on the granite countertop. The whole thing crumbled and riuned my kitchen rug. Not worth it
customer_reviews.author: sabrina hester

customer_reviews.title: High hopes but no delivery
customer_reviews.text: I plugged in this iced tea maker and it seemed to immediately start heating up the element even though the power light was off, and there was a strange smell. I added water to the reservoir and it made a hissing sound like it was hitting hot metal. I proceeded to run through the initial cleaning as instructed and it seemed to work fine. I then loaded up with tea bags, ice in the pitcher, and water in the reservoir and it wouldn’t turn on. I waited a while, unplugged/plugged it and nothing. This product seems flimsy and poorly constructed. But it is a low cost brewer.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This is the best ice tea maker
customer_reviews.text: Best ice tea maker yet! Makes a lot if u max out The water
customer_reviews.author: Scott Schlesinger

customer_reviews.title: Good looking small footprint
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed 3qt small foot print, easy to use and to clean makes coffee or great ice tea .I was trying to get off fruit juice and colas. This is as close to drinking water as I get.I love it!
customer_reviews.author: curtis phillips

customer_reviews.title: Arrived and put to work right away
customer_reviews.text: So far its fantastic and brews a pitcher full very quickly. Easy to use just fill with water put the tea bags in and push the button. A-PLUS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: Scared to use it as the pitcher is glass and afraid to break it.
customer_reviews.author: poleck

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this iced tea maker! I never have to boil water again, and this is instant , takes total 5 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Garbage glass pitcher broke after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: Would never buy! Didn’t even last a month and return window is closed !!! Didn’t even drop the glass. Used it maybe 4 times and hubby set pitcher down and glass so thin it cracked ! Waste of total money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic chitnzy thin glass pitcher
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty , but chintzy. Light weight plastic and the pitcher is so thin the instructions actually say dont drop ice into it or glass might break. So because of these poor durability issues, we are returning it. Its more worry than joy. The replacement cost for the pitcher is as much as the unit.
customer_reviews.author: bethel

customer_reviews.title: So far works well
customer_reviews.text: First time I have used a brewing system for tea. But I do like that it is glass pitcher that can go into the refrigerator.. Though it would be better if the body was not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kuppy

customer_reviews.title: glass pitcher is too thin
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice and the third time I went to rinse out the glass carafe it cracked for no apparent reason. I didn't hit anything and the water was not cold or hot.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

product_meta.title: Nostalgia Iced Coffee Maker and Tea Brewing System, Glass Pitcher, 3 quart, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackLooking for an easy way to create your favorite Iced beverages? if so, the Nostalgia cafe ice Iced Coffee & tea brewing system is for you. This handy appliance will brew Iced Coffee, Iced lattes, ice teas, sweet teas and more! it has a removable filter basket that brews bags, Leaves or fresh ground Coffee and 3-quart glass pitcher. You will be chilling in minutes!.
feature_bullets: Ultimate brewing: Enjoy smooth, delicious drinks at home; Brews the best iced coffees, iced lattes, iced tea, lemonade, flavored water & more
3-quart capacity: Glass pitcher holds upto 12 cups and has a large handle for easy lifting and pouring. Includes a three-position lid that turns for free pouring, pouring with ice guard or closed

Filter basket & shower head: The removable filter basket works with fresh ground coffee, tea bags and loose leaf teas, while the shower head is designed for complete saturation and optimal flavor extraction
Strength selector dial: Choose your desired flavor strength using the strength selector dial - ranging from 1 to 8
Flavor enhancer: Add lemon, herbs and other sweeteners to the flavor extraction chamber to further enhance the flavors
Auto shut off: When the brewing is done the unit is programmed to automatically shut off
Simple operation: Avoid having to deal with a complicated control panel - there is only one push-button to power on
Tidy storage: Convenient cord storage in bottom of unit

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,553 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
